posts.post_title: FS: Low/Mid-Grade T205 Lot - Many HOF & SP **Price Drop**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T205 lot available for sale. As you can see by the scans, these are low to mid-grade cards. Thanks for looking and feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.  All prices are delivered.  Payment via any method you prefer.
